summary: It's been some years since the end of the Shinobi War. Naruto Uzumaki is the 7th Hokage of Konohagakure, in this new era. His son, Boruto Uzumaki, will soon enter the Chûnin exams, alongside Sarada Uchiha and the mysterious Mitsuki.
cast: Yûko Sanpei|Kokoro Kikuchi|Ryûichi Kijima|Junko Takeuchi|Chie Nakamura|Noriaki Sugiyama|Saori Hayami|Nana Mizuki|Kenshô Ono|Shôtarô Morikubo|Atsushi Abe|Satoshi Hino|Hidenori Takahashi|Yukari Tamura|Yôichi Masukawa|Akira Ishida|Ryôta Takeuchi|Kôki Miyata|Hana Takeda|Daisuke Namikawa|Hiroki Yasumoto|Hisao Egawa|Taira Kikumoto|Kengo Kawanishi|Minoru Kawai|Ayako Takeuchi|Shô Okumura|Tesshô Genda|Shinji Kawada|Ryôka Yuzuki|Ryôko Shiraishi|Laura Bailey|Ogie Banks|Brian Beacock|Catero Colbert|Robbie Daymond|Ben Diskin|Brian Donovan|Melissa Fahn|Maile Flanagan|Tom Gibis|Todd Haberkorn|Christophe Hespel|Kate Higgins|Danielle Judovits|Cherami Leigh|Yuri Lowenthal|Amanda Céline Miller|Max Mittelman|Xander Mobus|Liam O'Brien|Colleen O'Shaughnessey|Bryce Papenbrook|Derek Stephen Prince|Stephanie Sheh|Christopher Corey Smith|Spike Spencer|Paul St. Peter|Wally Wingert
director: Directors: Hiroyuki Yamashita, Toshiyuki Tsuru (as Yasuaki Kurotsu)
title: Boruto: Naruto the Movie
